name: Stumble Reviews
author: Sajith

sections.description:
If you installed stumble toolbar in your browser, you can see a white bubble button. It is called stumble review button. When you browse a website url, if you press this bubble, you can see the reviews regarding that website by different stumbleupon users. Take your wordpress blog posts and click on stumble review bubble, you can see others reviews about each of your blog post.

If you are getting more reviews for your wordpress blog post, it is the time to reveal or expose your reviews in front of your blog readers.

This is a wordpress plugin which shows your post reviews by stumble users.

If you are not a wordpress widget user, add the below code in Template Editor.

<?php wp_stumble_review_template()  ?>

If your plugin is not working , please mail to admin@sajithmr.com

For details please visit : http://www.sajithmr.com/stumble-reviews-wordpress-plugin/
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the files
  2. Upload stumble-reviews directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Should i edit any files?

If you are using widget, you have to do nothing more than just activate the plugin

Else

Add this code to the location where you would like to add your plugin: <?php wp_stumble_review_template() ?>

If you want its simple version use <?php simple_sumble_review_template() ?>
